climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

features: ✅ NATURAL SOLUTION - Choose VIVAGO charcoal infused bamboo toothbrushes to replace your old plastic ones and choose health for your family and the environment. Sustainable, natural, organic and compostable bamboo is the eco-friendly, green alternative to traditional toothbrushes which account for 1% of all plastic waste on the planet.
✅BPA FREE ULTRA SOFT BRISTLES - Super soft bristles that will clean your teeth without hurting the gums and yet crafted in a way that the bristles will never shed away.
✅ SMOOTH & NATURAL BAMBOO HANDLE - Excellent quality materials ensure that the bamboo will not split nor splinter. Bamboo is naturally strong and water-resistant and therefore durable..
✅ PERFECT FOR FAMILIES - Set of 10 tooth brushes, Packed 2 to each individual box in this pack of 10, and each numbered to avoid confusion among family members.
✅ 100% RECYCLABLE PACKAGING - Not only our bamboo toothbrushes are biodegradable, but also our packaging is totally recyclable. We are doing the best to protect our environment.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The fact that you are looking to purchase bamboo toothbrushes means that you probably already know that in the U.S. alone, we throw out about 1.5 billion plastic toothbrushes every year? You also know that this has a profoundly bad effect on the planet and especially on the oceans and the animals who live in them. YOU’VE COME TO THE RIGHT PLACE TO MAKE CHANGE! Vivago brings you quality carbon toothbrushes that work like regular plastic toothbrushes, and with natural materials to help us keep our planet a little cleaner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft. individually packaged
reviews.reviewText: Impressed with this purchase. Very soft yet efficient brush. I like the wood esthetic plus bio conscience. Good buy. Good value. Quality product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020
reviews.reviewText: These were ordered as the normal toothbrushes from the grocery store were not comfortable to use. What a refreshing change. The handle is rigid and sized properly. The head of the toothbrush is also properly sized and comfortable to use. When brushing is complete my mouth feels comfortable not beat up. The quality is excellent. What a good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the cost
reviews.reviewText: I’ve ordered bamboo toothbrushes before and loved them. However, I have only used one of this brand and already had to retrieve over 5 bristles from my teeth after brushing.I don’t recall the previous brand I purchased losing bristles this easily. But I will use the entire package before I make a final decision on them, might be just one bad brush?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These tooth brushes have exceeded expectations. I was expecting a cheap tooth brush. No biggie as I change brushes regularly. But I have been very impressed with the way they brush. Not too hard not too soft. I like them and will buy more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy using this toothbrush. My teeth feel very clean and I love tbat it is a non plastic option. It is comfortable to hold and the brisles are soft. Also very cool that the toothbrushes have numbers, so everyone in the family can use them.The ordering was smooth and the toothbrushes arrived within days.I will recommend it to my friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are the second bamboo toothbrushes I have bought, and I definitely like these better, would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Super soft but cheaply made
reviews.reviewText: First time buying biodegradable brush and i have mixed feeling.The good:The bristles are very soft. Softer than any other brush i had before.It looks very good with its bamboo handleIt's environmentally friendlyThe bad:The bristles are loose and every second of third brushing, one will get pull out above the others and irritates in the mouth. You can trim it but then few days later, it will happen again. They need better glue.When wet, the handle will stain white countertop. If say, be careful with marble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, soft bamboo toothbrushes
reviews.reviewText: Often when I buy “soft” bristled toothbrushes, they’re still too stiff for me, these are wonderful without being flimsy.I have no problems with bristles coming out or mold growing on the bamboo handles….these are simply comfortable and perfect!
